item.description:
Description

Jerome Mouffe is a virtuoso guitarist from Belgium who has dazzled international audiences with his passionate and spontaneous playing. Jerome has toured extensively as a soloist and chamber musician throughout the Unites States and Western Europe. He is currently a docto...ral candidate at the New England Conservatory in Boston under the direction of Elliot Fisk and has released has debut CD in 2009 on the VGo Recordings label.
You can learn more about his repertoire at
http://www.jeromemouffe.net/

The show will feature pieces by
Isaac Albeniz
Augustin Barrios
Mario
Castelnuevo-Tedesco
Astor Piazzola
Giulio Regondi

Visit boston4bhopal.org/spiritinmotion

the ticket prices are
$20 General Entrance
$10 For Students

You can buy your tickets at
https://www.brownpapertickets.com/event/225001
or call Saif Pathan at 864 593 8746

Bhopal,a city in the heartland of India, was witness to the worlds worst industrial disaster when a gas leak from the Union Carbide factory (now DOW Chemical Corporation) instantly killed thousands of people and injured hundreds of thousands more. The disaster continues to cause suffering in Bhopal due to ongoing health problems and continuing groundwater pollution cause by the DOW-Carbide factory site.
You can learn more about our organization through
http://www.studentsforbhopal.org/ and learn more about the struggle and history associated with the disaster at
www.bhopal.net

facebook: https://www.facebook.com/#!/events/295239190533262/
item.name: Spirit in Motion: A Classical Guitar Concert for Bhopal by Jerome Mouffe
